    • Method Detail

      • createStream

        OutStream createStream(int column,
                       OrcProto.Stream.Kind kind)
                throws IOException
        Create a stream to store part of a column.
        Parameters:
        column - the column id for the stream
        kind - the kind of stream
        Returns:
        The output outStream that the section needs to be written to.
        Throws:
        IOException
